snippet: The Sacramento Kings hired the Hall of Famer Nancy Lieberman as an assistant coach. She became the second female assistant coach to join an N.B.A. staff.
abstract: Nancy Lieberman is hired by Sacramento Kings to become second female assistant coach for an NBA team.
lead_paragraph: The Sacramento Kings hired the Hall of Famer Nancy Lieberman as an assistant coach. She became the second female assistant coach to join an N.B.A. staff.

headline.main: Nancy Lieberman Named Assistant for Kings
